title: La Monella
description: Italian vegetarian restaurant with an inviting atmosphere, and with a very large menu including: pizza, pasta, main dishes with a twist, fresh from the market, and antipasti different to other Italian restaurants. Recommended to make a reservation. Note that on Saturday a reservation might be difficult as they only open at 6pm and only answer the telephone staring at 5.15 pm. Accepts EC-Karte. Directions: take U1 till the Hallerstrasse stop and walk 4 minutes to the west.
